pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bibliometrix Example Datasets // It contains some example datasets used in 'bibliometrix'. The data are bibliographic datasets exported from the 'SCOPUS' (https://scopus.com) and 'Clarivate Analytics Web of Science' (https://www.webofscience.com/) databases. They can be used to test the different features of the package 'bibliometrix' (https://bibliometrix.org).
